tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr.Krishna Prasanna in Aksha hospital, Nallagandla. She is very cool and friendly in discussing the health condition of mine. I had anterior central placenta previa till the end. And i had GDM. I had brown discharge twice during my pregnancy in 28th week and 33rd week. She was personally in touch with me on phone and suggested medication accordingly. I had heavy vaginal bleeding in my 35th week of gestation. She arranged everything and asked me to admit in the care hospital (as she is working in care and due to the pregnancy complications i had) and delivered the baby via emergency c section. I strongly recommend her for consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.p.krishna set a in house i mean community based visit for the sake of residents for various menstrual problems in women. That time i consulted with her with my post menopause/abdominal pelvic scan . Later I came to know that we can have an appointment of the particular doctor at care hospitals  high tech city. Immediately I got done with all my reports and she suggested to go for biopsy as the endometrial line is got thickened by 10 mm which is not good for my age of 66 years. So by the way the biopsy shows negative. Dr. P.Krishna asked me to go for mri and oncology suggestion .
She guided me well advance in getting further surgery and is very concerned about me also. Though I am not her patient in the later stages she visited me advised me for further well being. Thank you for the doctor üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Maternal Care/ Checkup,Prenatal Checkup,
review: I was consulting with Dr Krishna for my pregnancy. Dr was very friendly and was explaining things well. And she was very dedicated and helpful at the delivery time. Thank you so much.   Also I had hyperthyroidism for which Dr Krishna provided guidances time to time.  I would recommend her  for any maternity related consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Irregular Periods,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,Pregnancy,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: I consulted Dr Krishna for PCOS problem and pregnancy related. She is such a wonderful doctor i have ever met in my life. She truly cares for her patients and remembers entire case of the patient from inch to inch. She is always ready to walk that extra mile to give the best possible treatment and is just a phone call / message away in case of emergency. I really admire her for being so generous and caring. She was more than a doctor to me throughout my pregnancy journey and gave me the best suggestions whenever it was needed the most for me.  I never thought that I can recover from a C section so quickly and I wholeheartedly give that credit to the doctor for that. I can't thank her enough for being such a caring doctor and wonderful human being. After my surgery she has become favourite doctor to my mom and in law as well :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I visited Dr Krishna prasanna  mam regarding my mother health issue about overian cyst surgery she have taken care of  my mother very well she treated very well
This is the time to  express my sincere gratitude to  Dr Krishna mam
Actually, my mother is very afraid of doctors & hospitals your are very friendly with the patients 
My mother believed in you a lot 
Mom felt very happy  for your treatment  and your way of  talking with patients and showing care .

Thankyou so much ma'am üôèüèªüôèüíó

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
My 2nd pregnancy (high risk) journey started with complications and so I was quite worried about continuing with it. However, Krishna Prasanna Ma'am always had my back at each and every stage of pregnancy. Now, I am a happy mom to a healthy 2 month old all thanks to her.
She cares so much about her patients that she remembers patients cases better than patients themselves.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr Krishna for my issue with cervical polypectomy. She was patient and diligent in her clinical examination. She is one of the few Doctors i have seen, recommending an outpatient procedure rather than jumping to complicated and expensive surgeries. I got my procedure done with her which was smooth and painless. Thank you Dr Krishna.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She very friendly and listened all the issues and explained each issue in detail.. very polite understand the feelling of patient and treat according to it... I am very satisfied with the behavior and treatment given to my wife during last quarter of her pregnancy.... then whe  we met her... I highly recommend to visist her if you need gyno....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We first visited Dr.Krishna at Aksha Hospitals, Nallagandla in our first 1st month of pregnancy. She has been with us doing her best until safe delivery. Dr.Krishna is everything you could ask for in an ob-gyn and more. We often think of her as someone in family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: Primarily consulted to conceive pregnancy, within 2 months, my wife conceived. Liked her patience to listen to the patient and clarifying all the queries and explaining all what she did. I already recommended to my friends and they started consulting. I give her üíØ out of üíØ. Now delivery is expected in next month. She is just awesome and wonderful human being.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Krishna P Shyam is like angel for us, under her guidance, after 9 year long waiting finally we blessed with baby. She is awesome personality, soft spoken, understanding and very professional. Many time she went extra miles, sacrificing her personal time to promptly diagnose issue and provide in time help and support. We visited many gynaecologist but she is the best, always reachable via various channels.

Thank you so much mam for all your support and we are lucky to find doctor like you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Krishna P Shyam  madam is amazing at what she does.She understood what I wanted  and helped me through the process with utmost poise and care.She is very knowledgeable and professional.Very soft spoken.she has made it possible  for me to even reach her through phone throughout my treatment at all times.I  would recommend her to every woman seeking help for obstetrics/gynecological issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Evacuation of Retained Products of Conception (ERPC),
review: ** ******* *** ** *** ** *** **** ****** ** ************  Very soft spoken, ************** well mannered, Kindness, well experienced, pinpoint treatment, no unwanted advice, well Patients care doctor I ever seen in my life. Doctors like God, it is best example. Our hope, our believe, our patients totally on doctor said hand. I salute this doctor. I pray to God for her career growth and care towards patient. Thanks a lot

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Krishna Ma'am is one of the best gynaecologist I have met. She is patient friendly and explains everything in detail. She is soft spoken and is very caring. She will not let you undergo any unnecessary procedures. I will recommend her to anyone who wants to visit a good gynaecologist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Excellent experience. I visited her clinic 5 months back ever since I'm in constant touch with her. She is very cooperative and every step of the treatment was explained in detail. 
Great experience, great gesture, and overall awesome experience.  We proudly recommend Dr. Krishna. Thank you very much!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I have been visiting Dr. Krishna during and after my pregnancy. She was very patient in explaining the situation very well, have asked for relevant tests and recommended right diagnostic and treatment options. She is also reachable and takes an extra mile to follow up. Overall, I found her very friendly and knowledgable doctor whom I can trust and speak without any hesitation. I highly recommend her. Thanks a lot, Dr. Krishna.

Dr.Krishna is very friendly and listens to  all the queries very patiently. she explains everything in detail and gives enough time to patient. I would really like to thank her for all her efforts üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I really recommend Dr Krishna for any women who are trying to conceive and due to several other factors it is not working out. Dr Krishna has given me the best suggestion with limited medicines. She instills confidence in the patient that they should not worry much and has given me lot of good suggestions on how i can be healthier. Really trust her in every way.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
When I came to know that I am carrying, my 1st concern was about the doctor. I am a Malayali and we have a Hyderabad malayali group.  From that group I came to know about Dr. Krishna Ma'am. 
Then I booked my 1st appointment. In the 1st consultation itself I was really satisfied with doctor's approach. She  enquired about all my physical conditions and other symptoms in detail and gave good advices. As it is my 1st pregnancy I was little bit scared, but after the 1st consultation itself I feel very free.. 
I really like her friendly approach to patients and it is really important for any patient. 
I will recommend Dr. Krishna Ma'am to those who are close to me. Because my experience with her was absolutely great and I am really happy with her treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I started consulting Dr. Krishna Syam.2 years back during lockdown and has been a wonderful experience under her treatment thus far both online and offline. She is extremely **************  patient and, approachable while answering any queries and explaining the treatment options in detail..She is very understanding of your life and family situation and gives advice in friendly and gentle way..My condition consistently improved under her guidance and health treatment..I am so grateful to be under her care and would highly recommend her for anyone looking for a seasoned gynaecologist anytime. It's hard to find such humble doctors like Dr. Krishna these days whi truly careüôèüôèüôè

review: She was supportive and was very concerned about my health too. She was very supportive from the beginning until the termination process got over.

review: Dr Krishna was very friendly with us from day 1 of consultation. She patiently listened to all my problems and answered all the queries on a timely basis.I recommend Dr. Krishna to all my friends.

review: I was diagnosed with ectopic pregnancy,and it was tubal abortion Actually I need to get laproscopic surgery but ended up healing via injection, Dr.Krishna mam treated with personel care and gave me confidence and she visioned in a best way and gave me treatment,I have overcome this with out the surgery,I would say she's the best gynaecologist who really goes very deep into the procedure and the patient condition to process the best treatment.Am very much satisfied and thankful to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Dr. Krishna is very friendly and supportive. Truly appreciate her approach and treatment. She is very helpful in responding to certain time critical queries over phone. Excellent guidance and assurance received from her till date. It's a wonderful experience and would highly recommend her for any / every gynec related topics or issues. Thank you once again for all the support Madam, sincerely appreciate it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Krishna has been pivotal in our pregnancy journey. She guided and supported us in every hiccup we faced and was always available for any doubts and questions we had regarding pregnancy and baby movements. It was very comforting having such an experienced and qualified doctor as a guide in our experience.
